title.rendered: I Haven’t Heard from Him. Could It Be Well Worth Calling Him?

content.rendered:
Reader Question:

i have already been hanging out with this person on and off for a few months. He’s got already been taking much more initiative receive with each other. Finally weekend we sought out to dinner, which we never proclaimed a “date,” but we finished up spending the remainder evening collectively.

By the end with the night, he started cuddling up with me personally (keeping hands, working hands through hair, legs intertwined). After the night time as he stepped me to my vehicle, we kissed him. You will findn’t heard from him since.

Could it be well worth contacting him?

-Irene (Montana)

Dr. Wendy Walsh’s Answer:

Irene:

NO!!!! permit him chase you quite. I am thinking who had been more literally intense on that go out.

You didn’t say “the guy kissed myself” or “We kissed.” You mentioned you kissed him.

Could which have frightened him off?

I believe you need to place low for some time nevertheless. Contain yourself and hold off to see their next action.
